p: Most of these major compounds are oxygenated compounds. The oxygenated terpenes have been reported as more bioactive compounds than non-oxygenated ones due to the reactivity of the hydroxyl group [ 9, 10, 34, 39]. In the present study, the oxygenated compounds represent 66.22% of the total identified compounds in the Egyptian ecospecies, while they represent 70.83% of the Saudi ecospecies.
